revised_title: Observation of the Meteor of August 18, 1783, and Its Characteristics
tldr: The author describes his observation of a remarkable meteor on August 18, 1783, near York. The meteor appeared as a bright, bluish-white ball with a tail of dusky red, moving across the sky and eventually vanishing. The author provides details on the meteor's appearance, duration, and estimated distance, as well as the sounds heard after its dissipation.
